If you have trouble running the application: 1. turn OFF battery optimization (Huawei, Xiaomi..) (HONOR users: Phone settings > Battery > App launch and then set BATTERY app to Manage manually !!!) Some phones have an option that automatically closes all apps when phone is on sleep mode. This prevents Battery Alarm app from starting. In order to avoid this issue, enable Battery Alarm app notification and then find the power saving option on your phone, open it and add Battery Alarm app to protected apps or disable optimization for Battery Alarm app . It is usually under Phone battery app settings.  This option might be called:  Power saving Batter optimization Battery usage App optimization  Check out the websites: https://dontkillmyapp.com/   Battery Alarm does not ask for any permissions or rooting of the phone. You can use a combination Voice Warning, Sound Warning and Notification Warning.  Voice Warning -> Media volume Sound Warning -> Ringtone volume Notifications Warning -> Notifications volume   Battery Usage - not all phones are supported Close App - Exits the application and is no longer active Minimize App - The app is active and monitors battery status   Languages (Only TEXT, not voice alert) supported: English, etina, dansk, Deutsch, espaol, franais, Indonesia, italiano, magyar, Nederlands, polski, portugus, romn, slovenina, Trke, , Ting vit, , ,  I use google translator, feel free to email me any translation errors to correct.
